Class TierDiscount

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.dinggoapplication.Entity.Deal
      • com.dinggoapplication.Entity.TierDiscount

  • public class TierDiscount
extends Deal
    Tiered Discount Object - Certain amount off the spent amount for a certain tiered amount
    Version:
    2.1 Created by Leon on 17/2/2015.
    Author:
    Lee Quee Leong & Seah Siu Ngee
